full_summary:
# Invitation to Information Session: Government of Canada’s Cloud and Hosting Procurement Ecosystem

### Official Information

* **Contract Reference Number**: CB-14-89914483
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: GCCH3-2024
* **Publication Date**: May 7, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2024, 10:00 a.m. EDT
* **Amendment Date**: May 28, 2024
* **Contract Duration**: Unknown

### Notice Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Information
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Not applicable

### Invitation to Industry Session

The Government of Canada is inviting vendors to an Information Session regarding its modernized hosting strategy, scheduled for May 15, 2024. The session aims to provide additional information about the procurement ecosystem and the transition strategy.

Two sessions are offered in both English and French:

*   **French-language session**: May 15, 2024, 10:00 a.m. EDT
*   **English-language session**: May 15, 2024, 11:00 a.m. EDT

### Contact Information and Registration

To participate, please send your contact information to Nadia Kelly, Manager of the Cloud Services Team, at `pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca`.

Your email should include your contact details and any specific requests or questions you may have regarding the session.

Note: The invitation and the materials presented during the industry session are subject to change.

### Resources

You can find the session presentation here: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33552/presentation-industry-day-3.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33552/presentation-industry-day-3.pdf) (French link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33552/presentation-journee-de-lindustrie-3.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/33552/presentation-journee-de-lindustrie-3.pdf)) 

### Contracting Agency

Please direct any questions or concerns to Shared Services Canada, located at 400
